name: Old Mopeds
description:
Old Mopeds

In order to run this game, you need to install four things. All install files are located in the Install folder in this ZIP file.

1) The XNA framework installer called: "XNA Framework 4.0 Redist.msi".

2) .NET framework 4.5.1 installer called: "sqlite-netFx451-setup-bundle-x64-2013-1.0.92.0.exe".

3) OpenAL Installer called: "OpenAL Install.exe".

4) LinQConnect installer called: "linqconnectfree.exe".

When these installs have been run, the game can be started by opening the OldMopeds.exe file in the release folder, or through the solution folder containing the source code.

To play the game:

1: Write your name and press Login.

2: Press Career

3: To drive the moped hold right arrow key down.

4: To change gear press 'A' for a higher gear or 'Z' for a lower gear.

I DO NOT own any of the sounds or assest used in this project!!!! I can't find the links to the artists who created the sounds and assest, BUT I DO NOT OWN THEM!!

DO NOT USE ANY OF THE SCRIPTS!!!!!!
